description: Details of communication actions taken to deliver critical results to recipients and confirm receipt.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record for this row.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RSLT_TRK_RECIP_ST_C
columns.description:
per-recipient status for result tracking


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Required


In Progress


Completed

columns.name: RSLT_TRK_RECIP_NAME
columns.description: name of recipient (needed for ad hoc)

columns.name: RSLT_TRK_RCP_EMP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: RSLT_TRK_RCP_POL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the reading pool record for this row.

columns.name: RSLT_TRK_RCP_POL_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: RSLT_TRK_RECIP_ADHO
columns.description: ad hoc string for result tracking (see item 52016)

columns.name: RSLT_TRK_RECIP_INST
columns.description: instant when a followup action was performed

columns.name: RSLT_TRK_RECIP_ME_C_NAME
columns.description:
method used to contact this recipient


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In Basket


Fax


Mail


Phone


Pager


Email

columns.name: RSLT_TRK_RECIP_COMT
columns.description: user-entered free text comment about followup with recipient

columns.name: RSLT_TRK_RCP_USR_ID
columns.description: the user that performed the followup action from within epic

columns.name: RSLTTRK_CMT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Result Tracking Recipient comment networked to HNO record
